Preference.android:title: Loop Mode
Preference.android:summary: Boolean preference for enabling or disabling Loop Mode

Preference.android:title: Save Session
Preference.android:summary: Boolean preference for whether or not to save previously read comic

Preference.android:title: Save Recent
Preference.android:summary: Boolean preference for whether or not to save recently read comics

Preference.android:title: Keep Backlight On
Preference.android:summary: If true, the device/'s backlight will not timeout while reading

Preference.android:title: Zoom Index
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing the index of a pre-defined zoom ratio

Preference.android:title: Orientation Index
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing the index of a pre-defined orientation

Preference.android:title: Archive Mode Index
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing the index of a pre-defined archive extraction mode

Preference.android:title: Cache Mode Index
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing the index of a pre-defined caching procedure

Preference.android:title: Extract Mode Index
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing the index of a pre-defined archive extraction procedure

Preference.android:title: Cache Level
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing how aggressively to cache

Preference.android:title: Recursion Level
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing how many levels to recurse when looking for files

Preference.android:title: Dynamic Resizing
Preference.android:summary: Integer representing index of option regarding whether to resize images upon allocation

Preference.android:title: Home Directory
Preference.android:summary: User home directory or other saved directory for defaulting to

Preference.android:title: Last Read
Preference.android:summary: String location of File last read

Preference.android:title: Last Read Index
Preference.android:summary: Index of page on which the last File read left off
